ERIC is a project of the PEW Charitable Trust.

PEW is one of the top Grant Makers for the leftist radical environment movement.

ERIC IS ESSENTIALLY A LEFT WING VOTER REGISTRATION DRIVE PAID FOR BY us the taxpayer via THE STATES!

States join the ERIC system by signing a contract and paying $25,000 membership fee. Once paid, top election official from the state is granted an ERIC Board seat….

ERIC DOES NOT REQUIRE OR MANDATE ORDERING THE STATE MEMBERS TO CLEAN UP THEIR VOTER ROLLS AND DOES NOT WANT A LIST OF WHO IS VOTING ILLEGALLY!

Election fraud is real and ERIC intends to control who votes, who works the polls, and who counts the votes.

South Carolina Secretary Mark Hammond needs to hear from us to demand SC suspends our contract with ERIC .

We must SECURE VOTING INTEGRITY HERE IN SC!

card.description: Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti dismissed criticism he received for defying his city’s indoor mask mandate multiple times at NFL games by saying that the controversy “is not a real story.”
card.title: LA Mayor Eric Garcetti blows off mask controversy: 'This isn't a real story'

_source.content: LA Demoncrap Mayor Eric Garcetti blows off mask controversy: 'This isn't a real story'Mayor Garcetti was spotted two different times without a mask at indoor sporting eventshttps://www.foxnews.com/politics/la-mayor-eric-garcetti-blows-off-mask-controversy-this-isnt-a-real-storyLos Angeles Demoncrap Mayor Eric Garcetti dismissed criticism he received for defying his city’s indoor mask mandate multiple times at NFL games by saying that the controversy "is not a real story.""I was abiding by the county regulations, for instance at the Super Bowl I abided the whole time, you’re allowed to eat and drink with the mask off and I always gave people my face for a picture because that’s what they asked for," Garcetti told Fox Los Angeles. "I think that there’s real news out there and this isn’t a real story."Garcetti continued, "My advice is, if you’re mayor, don’t take the mask off for the picture."Garcetti, a Demoncrap, has faced backlash on social media after being spotted multiple times violating indoor mask mandates in California that were in place until this week. Many of those criticizing Garcetti pointed out that children in California are required to wear masks in schools, even outdoors, and expressed frustration that Garcetti has strongly advocated for mask wearing during the coronavirus pandemic.

LA Demoncrap Mayor Eric Garcetti blows off mask controversy: 'This isn't a real story'

Mayor Garcetti was spotted two different times without a mask at indoor sporting events

https://www.foxnews.com/politics/la-mayor-eric-garcetti-blows-off-mask-controversy-this-isnt-a-real-story

Los Angeles Demoncrap Mayor Eric Garcetti dismissed criticism he received for defying his city’s indoor mask mandate multiple times at NFL games by saying that the controversy "is not a real story."

"I was abiding by the county regulations, for instance at the Super Bowl I abided the whole time, you’re allowed to eat and drink with the mask off and I always gave people my face for a picture because that’s what they asked for," Garcetti told Fox Los Angeles. "I think that there’s real news out there and this isn’t a real story."

Garcetti continued, "My advice is, if you’re mayor, don’t take the mask off for the picture."

Garcetti, a Demoncrap, has faced backlash on social media after being spotted multiple times violating indoor mask mandates in California that were in place until this week. Many of those criticizing Garcetti pointed out that children in California are required to wear masks in schools, even outdoors, and expressed frustration that Garcetti has strongly advocated for mask wearing during the coronavirus pandemic.

card.title: Hearing turns on polygamy

_source.content: @minorfiat Hearing turns on polygamy 2003 (LUDLOW PLACED THERE BY BILL CLINTON)Confirmation proceedings for a would-be southern Utah judge opened the door Wednesday to an exploration of the state's handling of polygamy cases, especially those involving child brides.State senators looking into criticism of Washington County Attorney Eric Ludlow's dealings with polygamist matters during his 12 years in office delved into the issue Wednesday, at one point asking Utah Attorney General Mark Shurtleff to weigh in on his view of polygamy in Utah.Ludlow was before the committee a second time Wednesday, after members on April 9 voted unanimously to recommend the full Senate confirm him as a 5th District Court judge. Since that first vote, senators have received correspondence from anti-polygamist activists accusing Ludlow of ignoring polygamy cases during his tenure in office.https://www.deseret.com/2003/5/1/19719339/hearing-turns-on-polygamy
_source.contentraw:
@minorfiat Hearing turns on polygamy 2003 (LUDLOW PLACED THERE BY BILL CLINTON)
Confirmation proceedings for a would-be southern Utah judge opened the door Wednesday to an exploration of the state's handling of polygamy cases, especially those involving child brides.
State senators looking into criticism of Washington County Attorney Eric Ludlow's dealings with polygamist matters during his 12 years in office delved into the issue Wednesday, at one point asking Utah Attorney General Mark Shurtleff to weigh in on his view of polygamy in Utah.
Ludlow was before the committee a second time Wednesday, after members on April 9 voted unanimously to recommend the full Senate confirm him as a 5th District Court judge. Since that first vote, senators have received correspondence from anti-polygamist activists accusing Ludlow of ignoring polygamy cases during his tenure in office.

_source.contentraw:
THIS IS NOT A WAR

Forget the guns and the bombs. Think of how war comes to most people. They know who the enemy is, almost all of the time. They know all their neighbours support the war effort, or almost all of them. They know the weapons when they see them, with very few exceptions. They know they're all in it together, apart from the relative few who are collaborators. In short, they mightn't know how to win the war, but they know there is one and that all must play their part however small.

Now think of your family, friends and neighbours. How many of them even think this is anything other than a pandemic? How many of them know what this might be and what it might be used for? How many of those that do know understand it but accept it because the targets are 'extremists'?

If I am an 'extremist', George Orwell was one. I am not that far removed from him. Just Christian rather than an Atheist. I'm from the Left, just as he was.

I have long anticipated that what Orwell, or Eric Blair as he really was, wrote of would come in the computer age. And now it has.

It doesn't really matter what it's called when it's knocking down your doorstep and your neighbour doesn't know or doesn't care.

card.description:
Important advice from a great grassroots leader in TX:

Dear Seth,

My teams in Texas, who are working the elections for the primary in various counties are saying there are NOT ENOUGH ELECTION CLERKS. 😰

…Especially the large counties Harris, Travis, Williamson, Dallas, Nueces and Tarrant. I’m sure others are in the same boat. 

Please ask your base to contact their County Election Administrators office and/or party county chairperson to sign up ASAP. 

Zero experience needed. Training will be provided!

URGENT: Early election is underway and Election Day is March 1st.

County Election Admin contact: https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/voter/votregduties.shtml

County chairperson contact: https://texasgop.org/county_chairs/

Also, the night after polls close on March 1st is when precinct conventions begin. PLEASE PLEASE participate. This is how WE THE PEOPLE redress grievances and barely anyone knows this process. Tell them JUST SHOW UP. Sign up to attend when you vote at you election location or ask the county chair the date/location details!! 

👉Want to censure an elected official? Submit your resolution at the convention meeting.

👉Want to stop ERIC? Submit your resolution at the convention meeting.

👉Want to get rid of toll roads? Submit your resolution at the convention meeting.

Any grievances!!! Write it on a napkin and submit it!!!!

Thank you and Godspeed my friend!!

In Liberty, 🗽🇱🇷
Erika Hatfield
State Director of Texas
Convention of States

_source.contentraw:
@whereistruth17 ‘Elites’ That Support and Promote Depopulation

There is a clear consensus among the global elite that overpopulation is the primary cause of the most important problems that the world is facing and that something desperately needs to be done about it. They truly believe that humans are a plague upon the earth and that we will literally destroy the planet if we are left to our own devices.

The following are 30 population control quotes which show that the elite truly believe that humans are a plague upon the earth and that a great culling is necessary:


UK Television Presenter Sir David Attenborough: “We are a plague on the Earth. It’s coming home to roost over the next 50 years or so. It’s not just climate change; it’s sheer space, places to grow food for this enormous horde. Either we limit our population growth or the natural world will do it for us, and the natural world is doing it for us right now”

Paul Ehrlich, a former science adviser to president George W. Bush and the author of “The Population Bomb”: “To our minds, the fundamental cure, reducing the scale of the human enterprise (including the size of the population) to keep its aggregate consumption within the carrying capacity of Earth is obvious but too much neglected or denied”

CNN Founder Ted Turner: “A total world population of 250-300 million people, a 95% decline from present levels, would be ideal.”

David Rockefeller: “The negative impact of population growth on all of our planetary ecosystems is becoming appallingly evident.”

Colorado State University Professor Philip Cafaro in a paper entitled “Climate Ethics and Population Policy”: “Ending human population growth is almost certainly a necessary (but not sufficient) condition for preventing catastrophic global climate change. Indeed, significantly reducing current human numbers may be necessary in order to do so.“

Professor of Biology at the University of Texas at Austin Eric R. Pianka: “I do not bear any ill will toward people. However, I am convinced that the world, including all humanity, WOULD clearly be much better off without so many of us.”

Planned Parenthood Founder Margaret Sanger: “The most merciful thing that the large family does to one of its infant members is to kill it.”

Barack Obama’s primary science adviser, John P. Holdren: “A program of sterilizing women after their second or third child, despite the relatively greater difficulty of the operation than vasectomy, might be easier to implement than trying to sterilize men.

The development of a long-term sterilizing capsule that could be implanted under the skin and removed when pregnancy is desired opens additional possibilities for coercive fertility control. The capsule could be implanted at puberty and might be removable, with official permission, for a limited number of births.”
